name: DeploySsrs
description: Deploy items on MS SQL SSRS server based on a configuration file.
author: Mario Majcica

inputs.name: url
inputs.label: ReportService2010 endpoint URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Report Server Web service ReportService2010 endpoint URL

inputs.name: AuthScheme
inputs.label: Authentication
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the authentication mode for connecting to the SQL Server. In Windows authentication mode, the administrator's account, as specified in the Machines section, is used to connect to the SQL Server. In SQL Server Authentication mode, the SQL login and Password have to be provided in the parameters below.

inputs.name: Username
inputs.label: Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the SQL login to connect to the SQL Server. The option is only available if SQL Server Authentication mode has been selected.

inputs.name: Password
inputs.label: Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the Password of the SQL login. The option is only available if SQL Server Authentication mode has been selected.

inputs.name: rdlFilesFolder
inputs.label: Report Files Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path of the folder containing RDL and/or RSD files or on a UNC path like, \\\\BudgetIT\Web\Deploy\. The UNC path should be accessible to the machine's administrator account. Environment variables are also supported, like $env:windir, $env:systemroot, $env:windir\FabrikamFibre\DB. Wildcards can be used. For example, `**/*.rdl` for RDL files present in all sub folders.

inputs.name: ssrsFilePath
inputs.label: SSRS configuration file
inputs.helpMarkDown: Location of the XML or JSON configuration file.
If selected the DataSources in the configuration file will be referenced in the Reports, by matching the DataSource DataSourceReference value.
inputs.label: Reference DataSources
inputs.name: referenceDataSources

inputs.helpMarkDown: If selected the DataSets in the configuration file will be referenced in the Reports, by matching the DataSets SharedDataSetReference value.
inputs.label: Reference DataSets
inputs.name: referenceDataSets

inputs.helpMarkDown: If selected overwrites objects in the same path that already do exists.
inputs.label: Overwrite existing objects
inputs.name: overwrite
